title: Fifties Forever!: Popular Fashions for Men, Women, Boys & Girls (Schiffer Book for Collectors and Designers)
features: 1950s vintage clothing, from formal to classic, from party clothes and sports attire to underwear and sleepwear, is shown and described. Over 450 color photographs of American clothing for the whole family, adults and children. These styles hold a strong place in the Fifties Look that became popular around the world.
description: Roseann Ettinger is fascinated with the history of fashion. She owns Remember When, a vintage clothing and jewelry store in Hazleton, Pennsylvania, and has taken photographs for and written many other books in her fields for Schiffer Publishing.
